document_data.name: Jhaer Brightsong
document_data.mainbody: '''Jhaer Brightsong''' was one of the most well-known traveling minstrels in [[Mistledale]].
document_data.Personality: She enjoyed telling stories of ancient dangers and was known to assist [[adventurer]]s who shared their tales with her.
